title: Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart, Steel Mesh Removable Sides, 3 cu ft, 400 lb Capacity, Green
descriptions:
Introducing the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart, the perfect companion for all your gardening and hauling needs. With its durable steel frame and steel mesh construction, this garden cart is built to withstand heavy loads and tough conditions. 

Assembly is quick and hassle-free, allowing you to start using the cart right away. The side panels are removable, providing you with the flexibility to convert this cart into a flatbed for larger items. 

Equipped with 10-inch pneumatic tires, this cart offers excellent maneuverability with a tight turn radius. The ample ground clearance ensures smooth navigation over various terrains. The 4-wheel design provides stability and balance, making it easy to transport even heavy loads.

With a capacity of 400 lb, this cart can handle a wide range of gardening materials, tools, and supplies. The bed dimensions of 34 inches in length and 18 inches in width offer ample space for your belongings. 

The straight pull handle allows for easy pulling and maneuvering, reducing strain on your back and arms. 

Rest easy with the 1-year limited warranty, ensuring the quality and durability of this garden cart. 

With an overall height of 37 inches and weighing only 36.6 pounds, this cart is lightweight yet sturdy. The attractive green color adds a touch of style to your gardening endeavors.

Upgrade your gardening experience with the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart and enjoy the convenience and efficiency it brings to your outdoor tasks.

Product Listing: Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart

- Product Name: Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart
- Frame Material: Steel mesh
- Assembly: Quick assembly
- Convertible: Yes
- Side Panels: Removable
- Tires: 10-inch pneumatic
- Maneuverability: Tight turn radius, ample ground clearance, 4-wheel design
- Capacity: 400 lb
- Bed Dimensions: 34 inches (length) x 18 inches (width)
- Handle Type: Straight pull handle
- Warranty: 1-year limited
- Overall Height: 37 inches
- Weight: 36.6 pounds
- Color: Green

The Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart is a versatile and durable cart designed to make gardening and outdoor tasks easier. The cart features a sturdy steel mesh frame, providing durability and strength. With quick assembly, you can start using the cart in no time.

The cart is convertible, allowing you to transform it into a flatbed cart for larger items. The side panels are removable, giving you the flexibility to load and unload materials easily. The 10-inch pneumatic tires ensure smooth movement and easy maneuverability.

The Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart offers tight turn radius and ample ground clearance, making it easy to navigate through tight spaces and uneven terrains. The 4-wheel design provides stability and balance, even when carrying heavy loads.

With a capacity of 400 lb, this cart can handle a variety of gardening and outdoor tasks. The bed dimensions of 34 inches in length and 18 inches in width offer ample space for transporting plants, tools, and other materials.

The straight pull handle allows for comfortable and convenient pulling, reducing strain on your back and arms. The cart comes with a 1-year limited warranty, ensuring your satisfaction and peace of mind.

With an overall height of 37 inches and weighing only 36.6 pounds, the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart is lightweight and easy to handle. The cart is available in a vibrant green color, adding a touch of style to your gardening experience.

Get the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart and make your gardening tasks more efficient and enjoyable.
